# Type alias: PercentageFormatterFn()

> **PercentageFormatterFn**: (`percentageValue`) =\> `string`

A function used to format a percentage value as a string.

## Parameters[​](PercentageFormatterFn.html#parameters "Direct link to Parameters"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Parameters"} {#parameters .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

• **percentageValue**: `number`

## Returns[​](PercentageFormatterFn.html#returns "Direct link to Returns"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Returns"} {#returns .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

`string`
